desc.p: Time when the restriction was raised.
Validation filter used when the restriciton was raised.
This determines when a restriction will be valid.
Validation can either be ONLINE (T24 Online) or BATCH (T24 COB)
Portfolio number is a valid T24 entry in the SEC.ACC.MASTER application.
A 13 character long alphanumeric log code.
The security constraint associated with teh restriction.
Account number is a valid T24 entry in the ACCOUNT application.
Customer number is a valid T24 entry in the CUSTOMER application.
Date when the restriction was raised.
A 35 character long alphanumeric field to store the error message displayed.
